A Christmas Break

Ano: 2020

Sinopse: Mission City High alumnus Dylan Davidson is a Hollywood star in a slump since he was dumped by supermodel Monique Monteith, so his manager tells him to accept a PR stunt. Ideal is the request from Addison Tate, former classmate at and now principal of their home town high school, to direct the school Christmas play, a desperate fundraiser t prevent looming close-down of the school due to budget misery. The play goes well, as Dylan proves a born director and teacher, but rekindling romance with Addy is harder, especially with Monique inviting herself and dragging along the gutter press.—KGF Vissers
